div.p: The atmospheric response to North Atlantic and Pacific OWBCs individually: ( a, b) are similar to Fig. 3c but for the contribution from ( a) the Atlantic (ACF-NF) and ( b) Pacific (PCF-NF) SST fronts to the overall tropospheric response (BCF-NF) in Fig. 3c. ( c, d) are identical to Fig. 2d but for the contributions of the Atlantic (ACF-NF) and Pacific (PCF-NF) to the overall (BCF-NF) stratospheric response in Fig. 2d.
